Articles.Content:
Version 1.0.2, All stock

Bug: Craft explodes on non physical timewarp near Minmus. Very simple craft

Repro steps

Download save file linked in this report

Load "time_warp_bug.sfs"

Hit . for time warp

Craft explodes every time

Link to save file at mega.nz time_warp_bug.7z

I am having the same problem.

Both just leaving kerbin Atmosphere and orbiting Mun, as soon as i go into warp, BOOM, ship falls apart.
